changes: Patch update slots in slot dictionary instead of repopulating entire object.
Now listening to changes to slots and updating the component when they change.
Updated dependency on json5 to fix a security vulnerability.
The component config has been moved into each component.
Added support for passing boolean props as true without explicitly writing "true".
Now using React 18 to render the components.
Changed how components are unmounted to remove errors when webcomponents are used inside webcomponents.
Now making sure to unmount the React component when the custom element is removed from the DOM.
Components no longer trigger onChange-events when the setProps-function is called.
Removed conditionalElementStyles and instead now using display: contents.
Removed the wrapper span-element that some components used, as it is not needed with display: contents.
Removed the handling of styles because no components use plain css/scss anymore.
fixes: To trigger an event, manually use the triggerEvent-function instead of relying on the setProps to do it automatically.
Some components need their styles checked and fixed because of the change to display: contents.

changes: Improved the types (e.g. added ElviaComponent type for webComponent field).
Replace toolbox dependency with lodash.throttle directly
Upgrade to toolbox v2.0.0
Now only adding a style tag to webcomponents when there is style to be added.
Now adding the window.__webpack_nonce__ variable as a nonce to style tags for CSP support.
Bumped depencency on @elvia/elvis-toolbox.
Now using JSON5 to parse properties passed as objects. This allows for more flexibility in the way properties are written, such as the use of single quoted strings.
Added explicit support for function type properties.
Improved Typescript type safety.
Added Typescript declarations.
Added getProp function.
Update slot logic to support components inside components better.
No changes - failed to update.
Fixed React version dependency.
Fixed a bug where event dispatching with falsy value caused unexpected behaviour in some environments.
Fixed a bug when dispatching onChange-events where if the changing prop existed but had a falsy value the  name of the prop would be dispatched instead of the value.
Changed some protected functions to public so the ElvisComponentWrapper class can now be used as a  Typescript type for IntelliSense.
Added JSDoc documentation to commonly used public functions.
Fixed a bug in the triggerEvent()-function that caused an old way of triggering events to not function  properly.
Update so that triggerEvent can send data
Web components inside web components rerender bug fix.
Updated dependencies
Small toString bug fix
Conditional element style fix
New config for some components to support slotting
Support for kebab-case events that will work in Vue 3
Support for old conditional element style in wrapper
Now allowing props to have value null
Improved conditional elements type function
Bug fix for listening to slot-updates
Bug fix for converting string props into correct type
TriggerEvent function is now able to dispatch events with extra values also
